description: The Lyxor Russell 1000 Value UCITS ETF is a UCITS compliant exchange traded fund that aims to track the benchmark index Russell 1000 Value Net.The Russell 1000 Value Net measures the performance of the large-cap value segment of U.S. equities. It includes the Russell 1000 Index companies with lower price-to-book ratios and lower expected growth values. The Russell 1000 Value Net is created to provide a comprehensive and unbiased barometer for the large-cap value segment. The Index is reviewed annually to ensure new and growing equities are included and that the represented companies continue to reflect value characteristics. The complete construction methodology for the index is available on www.russell.comLyxor ETFs are efficient investment vehicles listed on exchange that offer transparent, liquid and low-cost exposure to the underlying benchmark index.
name: Lyxor Russell 1000 Value UCITS ETF
